entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
